home.headline: Software Engineer
home.subline: I'm Wishwa, a full stack software engineer building sustainable and impactful solutions by combining the precision of engineering with the creativity of design.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: Hello there ! I am wishwa  and i mostly live in the web but when duty calls ready to connect my interfaces with databases using django or go. If its not web, most probably i am delivering my interfaces to every screen using flutter or building AI agents. Always ready to tackle new problems using latest technologies and deliver exceptional products.

FLY.name: Webs R Us
FLY.achievements: Designed and developed travel application for creating itineraries and booking hotels through booking.com API.;Developed application in offline first approach to ensure users are capable of utilizing all the features provided by the application in low coverage areas.;Developed functionality to share itineraries and view live changes made by other users using supabase realtime features.;Designed and implemented a backend service using Gin, integrating two simulated databases to separate read and write operations, and configured automated database backups to a remote server.

WAD.name: We are designers
WAD.achievements: Worked for both mobile and web development teams.;Automated testing using selenium and jest to identify issues in key workflows, cross-browser compatibility, responsiveness and accessibility throughout the SDLC for e-commerce systems with wordpress enterprise websites and custom e-commerce and backend interfaces.;Designed and wrote test cases using dart and flutter for mobile and tablet applications of german social sheduling platform which currently has over 200 clients and Sri Lanka's First Buy 1 Get 1 Deals App from a well known Sri Lankan trade partnership which currently has 10,000+ downloads and average 4.4 rating in google play store.;Used JMeter to load test and measure performance of different applications/server/protocol types.;Collaborated with team members and project stakeholders to ensure timely and accurate delivery of software products.;Managed bug fixing process using Mantis bug tracker software.
